body_html: All of the grad checks are auto-generated based on test specs from other files. See e.g. those lines and follow the implementation of those functions. It would be better to just add grad checks to nn module tests that you care about. Can you please also remove the expect files? They don't serve any purpose in this case really...

It would be better to just add grad checks to nn module tests that you care about. Can you please also remove the expect files? They don't serve any purpose in this case really...
body: All of the grad checks are auto-generated based on test specs from other files. See e.g. [those lines](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_jit.py#L9598-L9605) and follow the implementation of those functions. It would be better to just add grad checks to nn module tests that you care about. Can you please also remove the expect files? They don't serve any purpose in this case really...
